title: Old 5 Rupee note
selftext: Found this old currency note in my grandmom's collection. I believe it to be from early 1950s based on some search. Is it really worth 5k as per online references?
comments: Based on the Governor signature, it was issued from 1957 to 1962
cleaned_text: old rupee note found old currency note grandmoms collection believe early based search really worth k per online references
